name: SHIFTshape
description:
SHIFTshape is a Ludum Dare 35 compo entry.

It's pretty simple, but I had some fun making it~

--Controls--

Use the directional keys to add to the shape in the relative direction.

Use left shift and the directional keys to remove a chunk in the relative direction.

Try and fit through as many conviently sized holes as possible!
